pages.name: Hint #1
pages.text: In shadows deep and moonlight's gleam, a cursed soul roams, unseen in day's beam. Seek the Wanderer where night takes part, his gift to you, the Glass Heart.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #1
pages.text: Obtain the Glass Heart scroll by trading with a Wandering Cursebringer. They will randomly spawn nearby you, and will be invisible during the day.

pages.name: Answer #1
pages.text: This is what the Wandering Cursebringer looks like.$(br)
